context: Toyfoundry completed Mass Alfa Seeding Batch 1 and published the baseline at toyfoundry_ai_0/production/mass_alfa_batch1/. Hydrate your assigned Alfa, rerun readiness/smoke, and return telemetry before Batch 2 is scoped. This order assigns Alfa-M02 to the Theta squad (target: r_and_d_ai_0).

directives.details: Sync the frozen baseline from toyfoundry_ai_0/production/mass_alfa_batch1/ (see baseline.md) and note the forge-alfa@2025-11-13-054 tag in your log.
Instantiate Alfa-M02 under your workspace's assigned slot; record the path in the toyfoundry instances.json mapping before proceeding.
Execute readiness + minimal smoke for the hydrated Alfa (python -m tools.ops_readiness; python tools/exchange_all.py or equivalent) and store logs under logs/mass_alfa_batch1/Alfa-M02/.
Verify exchange heartbeat + hello flow for the Alfa; stage a hello report citing readiness and smoke evidence.
File an ack + completion report referencing the hello report and telemetry; update toyfoundry with the final path + status.

success_criteria: Assigned Alfa hydrated with recorded path
Ack + completion report filed back to High Command/Toyfoundry
